sn14.38:1.4: The elements of earth, water, fire, and air.
sn14.38:1.5: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these four elements’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape …
sn14.38:1.6: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand these four elements’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape …”
